attributes.action: The taxpayer must not pay legal fees for politicians who are called to justice.
attributes.additional_details: Tax payers should not be expected to pay legal fees of politicians who are called to justice.  Instead political parties and / or individuals must pay for their defence costs and other fees.  There is no other walk of life in which this practice would be permitted and it must be stopped.
attributes.background: Government funds belong to tax payers.  They must not be used to pay legal fees for politicians who are called to justice in the courts.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632521
